sense.def:
A church
je stavba, v kateri kristjani opravljajo svoje verske obrede.

seg.quote: There were no services that day, and the church was empty.
His parents go to church now and then.

sense.def:
A Church
je ena od skupin ljudi znotraj krščanske vere, na primer katoliki.

seg.quote: Jane had been received into the Church a month previously.
